mapper.select: select t2.* from ( select t1.* , rank() over (partition by area_code order by cnt desc, s_no, a_no ) chart from (select a_cover, s_no, a_no, s_name, s_path, a_name, area_code, area_name, count(*) cnt from sound join album using(a_no) join (select p_no, a_no, s_no, area_code, area_name from playinfo join area using (area_code)) using (a_no, s_no) where area_code=#{area_code} group by a_cover, s_no, a_no, s_name,a_name,s_path, area_code, area_name order by cnt) t1 ) t2 where chart <= 10

select t2.* from ( select t1.*, (select g_name from genre where g_no=t1.g_no) g_name ,rank() over (partition by g_no order by cnt desc, s_no, a_no ) chart from (select a_cover, s_no, a_no, g_no,s_name,s_path, count(*) cnt from (select s_no, a_no, g_no, s_name,s_path from sound where g_no=#{g_no}) join album using(a_no) join (select p_no, a_no, s_no from playinfo) using (a_no, s_no) group by a_cover, s_no, a_no, g_no, s_name,s_path order by cnt) t1 ) t2 where chart <= 10

select artist.artist_name, artist.artist_no from sound sound join singer singer on sound.s_no=singer.s_no and sound.a_no=singer.a_no join artist artist on singer.artist_no = artist.artist_no where sound.a_no=#{a_no} and sound.s_no=#{s_no}
